content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, glad to meet you. I'm looking for the best possible price for my apartment, and I'm sure we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. What did you have in mind for the rental price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student so I am on a budget. I would say 350 euros per month is fair.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
I understand that you're on a budget, but I'm afraid that 350 euros per month is a bit too low for this apartment. The average rent for a one-bedroom apartment in the city center is around 450 euros per month, and this apartment is newly built and has a great location.

I'm willing to negotiate, but I can't go any lower than 400 euros per month. This is already a great price for a apartment of this quality, and I'm sure you'll find it to be a great value for the location and amenities.

Would you like to take a look around the apartment and see for yourself? I'm confident that once you see the apartment, you'll understand why it's worth the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to pay 380 euros per month. I think this is a good price for a student like me who is on a budget.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
I understand that 380 euros per month is a good price for a student on a budget, but I'm afraid that it's still a bit too low for this apartment. The landlord is looking for a minimum of 400 euros per month, and I'm not able to negotiate below that price.

However, I want to work with you to find a solution that fits your budget. Would you be willing to consider a shorter lease term, such as 6 months instead of 12? This would allow you to have a lower monthly payment while still enjoying the benefits of living in this great location.

Additionally, I can offer you some additional services, such as a furniture rental package or a utility cost reduction, that can help make your monthly expenses more manageable.

What do you think? Is this something you'd be interested in discussing further?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not interested in additional services and a shorter lease term is not an option for me.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
I understand, thank you for letting me know. In that case, I'm afraid we won't be able to come to an agreement on the price of the apartment.

As a landlord, I have a responsibility to ensure that the rent I charge is fair and reasonable, and I can't justify renting the apartment to you for 380 euros per month when the market rate is 400 euros per month.

I appreciate your interest in the apartment, and I hope you understand my position. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.

TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
